formattedAddress: 31 Jane St, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 31 Jane St, New York, NY 10014, USA

originalText.text:
Blaine Povanda is an outstanding home organizer and styler who exceeded my expectations in helping us get ready to sell our apt. Not only did she showcase her impeccable design skills, but she also provided invaluable recommendations that greatly enhanced the overall appeal of my space.

Throughout the process, Blaine's communication and helpfulness were exceptional. She actively listened to my needs and preferences, offering tailored recommendations. Her insights and guidance made the entire experience seamless and effective.

Blaine's attention to detail was evident in every aspect of her work. From organizing to styling, she utilized her expertise to create a space that was not only visually stunning but also strategically staged to attract potential buyers. Her keen eye for design truly transformed my apartment into a market-ready masterpiece.

originalText.text: I was so stressed and anxious trying to pick out new decor for our new home, organizing our existing stuff, all while expecting a new baby. Blaine eased our transition and made a new house feel like a home. I would hire her a thousand times over. She is a dream come true!

text.text: I was so stressed and anxious trying to pick out new decor for our new home, organizing our existing stuff, all while expecting a new baby. Blaine eased our transition and made a new house feel like a home. I would hire her a thousand times over. She is a dream come true!

originalText.text: Blaine literally transformed my life. I have OCD about everything except for my closets! I recently moved and she sorted everything out for me. I have an open shelf area before the bathroom entrance and she hid all of my extra toiletries and makeup etc. in adorable baskets. It looks so chic, but it’s also super efficient. Thank God for her or else I would have had ugly dollar tree Tupperware, haha. She’s the best!

originalText.text: Absolute perfection. Blaine is very personable and works hard to make your dreams a reality. She goes above and beyond. Anything I want done right, shes the woman I call.

text.text: Absolute perfection. Blaine is very personable and works hard to make your dreams a reality. She goes above and beyond. Anything I want done right, shes the woman I call.

originalText.text: I can't believe this is my closet! Getting ready is a breeze now that I actually know where everything is. Blaine cleared years of clutter and I can't wait for her to come back to tackle the rest of my home!
